# AnchoringComponent.Target.HandLocation

**Structure**

Defines the locations of tracked hands to look for.

## Declaration

```swift
struct HandLocation
```

## Structures

- **AnchoringComponent.Target.HandLocation.HandJoint**: Describes all the hand joints.

## Type Properties

- **aboveHand**: An anchor location above the center of the palm in the world space, regardless how the hand is rotated.
- **indexFingerTip**: An anchor location at the tip of the index finger.
- **palm**: An anchor location at the center of the palm.
- **thumbTip**: An anchor location at the tip of the thumb.
- **wrist**: An anchor location at the center of the wrist on the back of the hand.

## Type Methods

- **joint(for:)**: The function that returns the `HandLocation` based on `HandJoint`.

## Hand tracking

- **Happy Beam**: Leverage a Full Space to create a fun game using ARKit.
- **AnchoringComponent.Target.Chirality**: Defines the chirality of tracked hands to look for.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
